content.prompt:
The writer wants to make an addition to the beginning of sentence 14 (reproduced below), adjusting the capitalization as needed, to acknowledge a limitation to the argument of the passage.

Until more definitive evidence is unearthed, the conversation about how the pyramids were built is likely to continue.

Which of the following choices best accomplishes this goal?

choices.label: It should be acknowledged that there are different schools of thought about how archaeological evidence should be interpreted, and
While archaeologists have discovered astonishing cultural riches left behind by the ancient Egyptians,
As interest in ancient Egyptian civilization could actually increase in the future, there will doubtless be further archaeological studies of this kind in the future, so
Most archaeologists do think the builders of the pyramids employed some kind of ramp system to move blocks into place, but

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Qualify a claim using modifiers, counterarguments, or alternative perspectives.
